ReviewsData.name: Fausto Tello
ReviewsData.description: We Are Happy With The Completion Of Our Project And We Recommend To Line Construction/Mr.Yonerky Perez for the Following Reasons: 1- The project was completed Before the Agreed Time 2-Always Ready To Advise Us On The Changes We Needed 3- In This Project There Was Professionalism,Punctuality And Honestly 4- Finally,We Are Grateful To Have Fulfilled Our Dream Of This Beautiful Project

ReviewsData.name: Iler Rivera-Chicas
ReviewsData.description: The Line Construction Team assisted in completing our project in a professional and timely manner. Great attention to detail,  communicated every stage of the process and responsive to our requests. Highly recommend!

ReviewsData.name: Daniel Loza
ReviewsData.description: Line Construction completed our project on time. They were very communicative and always responded to our questions with options for us to decide. I will hire them again without a doubt.

ReviewsData.name: Sharon Sivakoff
ReviewsData.description: Line Construction is an outstanding company. We moved to Naples over 22 years ago from New York. Our home needed a lot of work, both big and small jobs. The owner of Line Construction, Yonerky is incredibly knowledgeable, honest, and…

ReviewsData.name: Yanin Mendez
ReviewsData.description: Very professional. Finished our home before the deadline date. Never had to ask for an update as I was getting them every 2 or 3 days.  Pictures were sent for every job completed. Always comunicating with us what the next step was. 100% recomended. Couldn’t ask for more.

ReviewsData.name: Miguel Junco Egüed
ReviewsData.description: Since first contact to the completion of the project, the team demonstrated great professionalism and dedication. Communication was fluid and they were always willing to answer my questions and address my concerns. The final result exceeded my expectations, as the work done was of high quality and completed within the agreed time frame. In addition, the staff were kind, courteous and respectful at all times. I would certainly recommend this construction company to anyone who is looking for reliable and quality service. Thank you for making my experience so positive and complicated!

ReviewsData.name: Sonrisa Cruz
ReviewsData.description: Line Construction did a phenomenal job building the lanai and pool at my home. The original plans came to fruition just as planned and the owner Nick was amazing and professional to work with. He was involved every step of the way and wanted the design to be just as beautiful as intended. I strongly recommend Line Construction, you will not be disappointed!

ReviewsData.name: Gilberto Mederos
ReviewsData.description: Line Construction is the best to build a home 5 stars. Communicating with me through this project has been excellent. I'm thankful for all the company has done to complete this home. - Gilberto Mederos

ReviewsData.name: Adrián Albite
ReviewsData.description: Excelent job. Outstanding comunication. Keept in touch in regular basis. Completed our home within rhe time frame we agreed and  best quality. Line construction is the way to go.

ReviewsData.name: Mary Al
ReviewsData.description: "I had the pleasure of experiencing Line Constructions' services when they completed a construction project for a friend. I must say, they are true professionals and incredibly responsible. The quality of their work speaks volumes about their dedication to excellence.  I wholeheartedly recommend Line Constructions to anyone in need of construction services. Their commitment to delivering top-notch results is truly commendable. You won't be disappointed!"
